definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
erhua variant of 一個勁|一个劲[yi1 ge4 jin4]

sentences.english: His mouth continued to twitch unspeaking in nervous curls of disdain.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇却一个劲儿地抽搐着，显示出神经质的嘲讽。

sentences.english: It took me a long time to answer that I really had no idea and kept shaking my head.
sentences.chinese: 我想了好久，最后一个劲地摇头说，真不知道先救谁。

sentences.english: That young girl Hun however don't feel, waving hand of a strength son.
sentences.chinese: 那少女浑然未觉，一个劲儿的挥手。

sentences.english: One of the children was pawing at my sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 有个孩子一个劲地拽我的袖子。

sentences.english: Even now her self-command is invariable.
sentences.chinese: 直到如今，她还一个劲地克制自己。

sentences.english: But Michelle still coped every word Adam said.
sentences.chinese: 可是雯馨还一个劲学嘉辉说话。

sentences.english: Bow The waiter showed us to our table with much bowingand scraping.
sentences.chinese: 服务员一个劲地点头哈腰领我们就座。

sentences.english: The startled horse charged about blindly, upsetting a row of ped1ars' stalls AT the side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 那匹惊马一个劲乱跑，把街旁一排小贩的货摊撞翻了。

sentences.english: The child was able to filter out the noises surrounding him, as he was so busy in his play.
sentences.chinese: 这个小孩一个劲地玩耍，全然没有注意周围的闹声。

sentences.english: He said it was him at first, and then he kept saying he had the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 他开始说是他，可是后来他又一个劲儿说拨错号码了。

sentences.english: The last call, he features a move in that he Hao Fan.
sentences.chinese: 最后一次通话时，他一个劲在说他好烦。

sentences.english: We all had colds and couldn't stop sniffing and sneezing.
sentences.chinese: 我们都感冒了，一个劲地抽鼻子，打喷嚏。

sentences.english: He was just kind of blinking.
sentences.chinese: 他只是一个劲的眨眼睛。

sentences.english: Daniel, don't just walk on with a lowered head.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你别只顾着低着头一个劲儿地往前走啊。

sentences.english: Zi brought mine, 78-year-old Uncle Wang features a move Shutaimuzhi.
sentences.chinese: 提起淄矿，78岁的王大爷一个劲竖大拇指。

definition: all one's strength/with might and main
hands dance and feet trip (idiom); dancing and gesticulating for joy
to argue noisily/to shout/to make widely known/to reproach
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
